name: Holy Warriors 3D
description:
The Holy Warriors were warriors who possessed special, unique armor, each with their own super moves. In a post apocalyptic world, full of monsters, mutants and undead creatures, the Holy Warriors became the only hope for our world ...

- A game of 1 to 10 players (on the same device).
- Each player will have his own unique special armor, with his own unique supermoves.
- Ability to drop new armor and new supermoves.
- Possibility to combine the pieces of the various armor, to generate hybrid armor!
- Lots of game modes: From the classic hunting mode (eliminate all enemies) to the protection mode (protect an object on the playing field), escort (escort a diligence at destination), survival ... and many others !!!
- Duel mode to fight 1vs1.

And ... many other surprises await you ..

The game is completely free. You can get some special pieces of armor and super moves, just by looking at advertisements (however it is not mandatory. You can get 100% of the objects without looking at any advertisements).
